variable.label: Alternative SUSI 1 usage

variable.tooltip:
11: SUSI pins as logic level outputs
22: SUSI pins as reed inputs
33: SUSI pins as servo control lines
44: SUSI pins as "SUSI pins" (same as 0)
55: SUSI pins as I2C bus
max=55
